resources.string: You\'ll receive an SMS shortly with the verification code
Ideal soil and weather condition for your crop

string.name: idTV1Expand
string.br: • Good drainage, good porosity and bulk density.\n
• Slightly acidic nature , rich in organic carbon content and with high humus level\n

string.name: idTV2Expand
string.br: • Apply 8-10 tons per acre of farmyard manure during field preparation.\n
• Apply 42kg per acre of urea 52kg per acre of DAP and 33kg of per acre of MOP 2 0r 3 days before transplanting.\n

string.name: idTV3Expand
string.br: • plow the landwith soil turning and harrow 3-5 times to obtain a fine and loose tilth.Pepare the deal against the slope in oeder to improve soil drainage .\n

string.name: idTV4Expand
string.br: • Seeds can be treated 24hr before sowing with antimicrobial or tungicidal powders or solutions e.g.-Trichoderma viride(4g-10g) per kg seed .\n
• Against fungal diseases: solutions containing thiram,captan or mancozeb (2.5g/kg seed) .\n

string.name: idTV5Expand
string.br: 1) Soak good quality seeds in warm water to soften them and speed germination.\n
2) While seeds are drying use a wooden teeth bars to mark seedbed soil 5cm apart and 0.5cm deep.\n
3) Dry seeds thoroughly and put 2-3 seeds per hole in seeded soil.\n
4) Cover the seeds lightly with soil from bed.\n
5) Water reasonably , add organic mulch if at hand to keep soil moist and at constant temperature.\n

string.name: idTV6Expand
string.br: • Now irrigate the soil timely with sufficient water and remove unwanted weeds, add fertilizers and manures and pesticide if required.\n

string.name: idTV7Expand
string.br: • Apply fertilizer pellete in the furrow and work them into soil.\n
• Do Irrigation if no rain expected to mix or embed fertilizer in soil deeply.\n
• Plan a foliar spray containing beran for e.g.borax(4g/l).\n
• In zinc deficient soil must be sure to apply Zinc for e.g.-zinc sulphate(5g/l).\n

string.name: idTV8Expand
string.br: • Monitor your field for infected plants and post, and remove them and use pesticides accordingly\n

string.name: idTV9Expand
string.br: • Fruits are picked normally at an interval of 4-5 days in summer and weekly intervals for winter.\n
• Harvesting is done with help of bulk pins.\n
• Fruits are packed into wide,shallow,stackable boxes. If they are already mature to avoid compression damage.\n
• Tomato should be picked during coolest part of day to avoid bruicins during picking process.\n

string.name: idTV12Expand
string.br: • All crop waste after harvest to avoid possible reintroduction of a disease in same field .In case of pests,plow the land with soil turning to exposure the insect to predators and solar radiations.\n

string.name: idTTVSoil
string.br: : Well drained,sandy or red loam soil rich in organic matter.\n

string.name: idTTVDesc
string.br: It is preferable because it price is more than 6 times of average agricultural price value in India. It has a global and growing market.

string.name: idCTVSoil
string.br: : laterite soil and sandy loam pH (6-6.6).\n

string.name: idCTVDesc
string.br: It is preferable because it price is more than 6 times of average agricultural price value in India. It has a global and growing market.

string.name: idGTVSoil
string.br: : loamy soil with good drainage pH (6-7).\n

string.name: idGTVDesc
string.br: It is preferable because it price is more than the average agricultural price value in India. It is required for both medical and eating purposes.

string.name: idGITVSoil
string.br: : Sandy loam, Clay loam, red loam, lateritic loam soil.\n

string.name: idGITVDesc
string.br: It is preferable because it price is more than the average agricultural price value in India. It is required for both medical and eating purposes.

string.name: idLTVSoil

string.name: idSTVSoil
string.br: : Rich alluvial soil, lava soil, heavy soil, with good drainage.\n

string.name: idSTVDesc
string.br: It is preferable because it price is more than 2 times of average agricultural price value in India. It has a global and growing market.

string.name: idSNTVSoil
string.br: : Alluvial, Moutain, Laterite, well drained soil with high amount of organic matter pH (4.5 - 5.5).\n

string.name: idSNTVDesc
string.br: It is preferable because it price is more than 2 times of average agricultural price value in India. It has a global and growing market.
